question: 58th conference of Asom Natya Sanmilan is to be held at which place?
explanation: The Asom Natya Sanmilan has announced the annual awards of Asom Natya Sanmilan Award-2019 is Nandeswar Saikia Auditorium, Nalbari, Assam. The awards were announced by Dulal Roy, president, and Bipul Chaliha, principal secretary of Asom Natya Sanmilan. The awards will be presented at the 58th conference of Asom Natya Sanmilan that will be held at Nalbari in January 2020.
